casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Rayford Lewis BURKE. No. 181A93-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. David G. Belser, Asheville, David B. Freedman, Winston-Salem, for Rayford Lewis Burke. Barry McNeil, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, Patsy Bruce, Assistant District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 14th day of June 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Iredell County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
